trans-unit.source: Provides properties that are used with the following events in the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 루트에서 다음과 같은 이벤트와 함께 사용 되는 속성을 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> 개체: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CursorEventArgs class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: CursorEventArgs 클래스도 노출 되는 `e` 에서 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>루트의 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: This class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 다음 속성이 포함:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>이벤트가 발생된 >for 발생 했음을 개체</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> 를 가져오는 데 사용 되는 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property gets the name of the chart area; other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>속성 차트 영역의 이름을 가져옵니다; 다른 차트 영역 속성을 설정할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>이벤트가 발생된 >for 발생 했음을 개체</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> 를 가져오는 데 사용 되는 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> -

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 축 유형을 확인 하려면-X, X2, Y2 또는 Y-사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 다른 축 속성을 설정할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the position of a cursor along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>이벤트가 발생할 때 축 값으로 측정 되는 축 따라 커서의 위치를 나타내는 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property can be used to get the position of a cursor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>속성은 커서의 위치를 가져오는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>이벤트, 커서 위치를 다시 설정 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property, which represents the starting position of a range selection along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>이벤트가 발생할 때 축 값으로 측정 되는 축 따라 범위 선택의 시작 위치를 나타내는 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property can be used to get the selected range start position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>속성은 선택한 범위 시작 위치를 가져오는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the position.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>이벤트 위치를 다시 설정 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property, which represents the end position of a range selection along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>이벤트가 발생할 때 축 값으로 측정 되는 속성의 축 따라 범위 선택 끝 위치를 나타내는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property can be used to get the selected range end position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>속성은 선택한 범위 끝 위치를 가져오는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the position.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>이벤트 위치를 다시 설정 하려면이 속성을 사용할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified chart area, axis, and cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"> </xref> 지정 된 차트 영역, 축 및 커서 위치를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> 커서의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 커서의 축입니다.

trans-unit.source: The new cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 새 커서 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified chart area, axis, start and end positions for the new range.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"> </xref> 새 범위에 대 한 지정 된 차트 영역, 축, 시작 및 끝 위치를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> 커서의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 커서의 축입니다.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new range selection.
trans-unit.target: 새 범위 선택의 시작 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The end position of the new range selection.
trans-unit.target: 새 범위 선택 끝 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> 개체에 속하고 커서 범위나 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Axis property is exposed in the following events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.
trans-unit.target: 축 속성이 루트의 다음 이벤트에 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 사용할 수 있습니다:-축 유형을 확인-X, X2, Y2 또는 Y-이벤트 발생을 사용 하 여 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A> 같은 축 속성 가져오기 및 설정

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> 커서 범위나 선택 속하는 축을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> 개체에 속하고 커서 범위나 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ChartArea property is exposed in the following events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.
trans-unit.target: ChartArea 속성이 루트의 다음 이벤트에 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - determine which chart area the event is being raised for; this is useful to know when there are multiple chart areas within a chart image.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 사용할 수 있습니다.-;에 대 한 이벤트가 발생 하는 차트 영역 확인 여러 차트 영역 차트 이미지를 안에 있는 경우 알아두어야 할 때 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - get and set chart area properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> 같은 차트 영역 속성 가져오기 및 설정

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> that represents the chart area that a range selection or cursor belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 개체 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> 차트 영역 범위 선택 또는 커서에 속하는 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of a cursor.
trans-unit.target: 커서의 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the cursor's position.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 따라 또한 커서의 위치를 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 커서의 새 위치를 나타내며에 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>커서 위치를 가져오는 이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 에 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>커서 위치를 설정 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>이벤트 아무런 효과가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition 속성이 값을 갖는 <xref:System.Double.NaN>이 이벤트에서.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 차트 영역에 대 한 이벤트 발생을 확인 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>범위가 고 주 따라 선택 된 보조 X 또는 Y 축에 대 한이 끝 위치 인지 확인 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a cursor along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 축의 커서의 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 선택 범위의 끝 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the end position of the range.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 따라 또한 범위의 끝 위치를 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The NewSelectionEnd property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: NewSelectionEnd 속성은 커서의 새 위치를 나타내며에 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>커서 위치를 가져오는 이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 에 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>커서 위치를 설정 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>이벤트 아무런 효과가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewSelectionEnd property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: NewSelectionEnd 속성이 값을 갖는 <xref:System.Double.NaN>이 이벤트에서.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: The start position of a selected range is not necessarily less than the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 범위의 시작 위치 반드시 보다 작지 않습니다 선택한 범위의 끝 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The start position is the position where the user fist clicked within the chart area, and the end position is the position of the mouse at the time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 시작 위치는 차트 영역 내에서 사용자 처음 클릭 이벤트가 발생할 때 끝 위치는 마우스의 위치를 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 차트 영역을 확인 하는 이벤트가 사용 하기 위해 발생 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>범위가 고 주 따라 선택 된 보조 X 또는 Y 축에 대 한이 끝 위치 인지 확인 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 선택한 범위의 끝 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 범위의 시작 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the start position of the range.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 따라 또한는 범위의 시작 위치를 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The NewSelectionStart property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: NewSelectionStart 속성은 커서의 새 위치를 나타내며에 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>커서 위치를 가져오는 이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 에 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>커서 위치를 설정 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event will have no effect; the NewSelectionStart property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>이벤트 아무런 효과가 없습니다; NewSelectionStart 속성은 값이 <xref:System.Double.NaN>이 이벤트에서.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The start position of a selected range is not necessarily less than the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 범위의 시작 위치 반드시 보다 작지 않습니다 선택한 범위의 끝 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The start position is the position where the user fist clicked within the chart area, and the end position is the position of the mouse at the time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 시작 위치는 차트 영역 내에서 사용자 처음 클릭 이벤트가 발생할 때 끝 위치는 마우스의 위치를 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 차트 영역에 대 한 이벤트 발생을 확인 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>범위가 고 주 따라 선택 된 보조 X 또는 Y 축에 대 한이 끝 위치 인지 확인 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the start position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 선택한 범위의 시작 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.
